mapper.select: select count(*) as cnt from qna

select * from ( SELECT no, ROWNUM as rNo, p_no as pNo, g_no as gNo, LPAD('-',2*(LEVEL-1)) || TITLE as title, m.id as id, writedate as wDate, hit FROM QNA q, member m where q.id=m.id START WITH p_no=0 CONNECT BY PRIOR no = p_no order SIBLINGS by g_no desc) where rNo BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
